## renovate

### Public repo

```shell
wget -O renovate.json https://raw.githubusercontent.com/book000/templates/master/renovate/public.json
```

### Private repo

```shell
wget -O renovate.json https://raw.githubusercontent.com/book000/templates/master/renovate/private.json
```
